original_text: And the high places that were before Jerusalem, which were on the right hand of the mount of corruption, which Solomon the king of Israel had builded for Ashtoreth the abomination of the Zidonians, and for Chemosh the abomination of the Moabites, and for Milcom the abomination of the children of Ammon, did the king defile.
korean_text: 또 예루살렘 앞 멸망의 산 오른쪽에 세운 산당들을 왕이 더럽게 하였으니 이는 옛적에 이스라엘 왕 솔로몬이 시돈 사람의 가증한 아스다롯과 모압 사람의 가증한 그모스와 암몬 자손의 가증한 밀곰을 위하여 세웠던 것이며

sentences.original_text: And the high places that were before Jerusalem
which were on the right hand of the mount of corruption
which Solomon the king of Israel had builded
for Ashtoreth the abomination of the Zidonians
and for Chemosh the abomination of the Moabites
and for Milcom the abomination of the children of Ammon
